name: Crazy Cake Rush - Lite
description:
Crazy Cake Rush - Serve hungry cats with fantastic cake combos in this fast paced fun game
=============
FREE VERSION
=============

The residents of Katopolis are crazy for cakes.
But they are getting tired of Mean Meow's boring 'ready to bake cake mix' stuff
They want novelty, variety, flavor…
…and all that served at lightning speed !
Can you stand up to the challenge ?


You have a chance to show your skill over several days as you unlock new cakes, icings, toppings and even experience new quirky customers.
All this is to get ready for the final showdown to break Mean Meow's record and become the ultimate baker of Katopolis
This cake business is all about concentration, speed, memory and fun.

Features
** Simple sequence tap gameplay
** Several new items to unlock
** Charming graphics
** Universal app to be enjoyed on any iOS device
** Auto save
** Fun for all ages
** Remember what your customers like to earn large tips
